testcase.name: StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > applies relative positioning when not scrolled
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > applies fixed positioning when scrolled past offsetTop
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > uses default offsetTop of 0 when not provided
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > stays relative when scroll is less than offsetTop
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > contains inner container with correct classes
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > removes scroll event listener on unmount
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > checks initial scroll state on mount
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > transitions between fixed and relative on scroll changes
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > updates when offsetTop prop changes
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > returns null when isVisible is false
StickyBreadcrumbWrapper > should handle SSR environment where window is undefined

failure.message: expected [Function] to not throw an error but 'ReferenceError: window is not defined' was thrown
